column5: Hey guys. I picked up a 1990 Formula Plus today with no motor. The guy bought it like that and has no idea what size motor it takes. I am wondering what motor sizes can just bolt in. I also would like to put in a fan cooled motor as opposed to a liquid cooled. Is there a fan cooled that can just bolt in?  Thanks guys  Curt
I have a '57 - 392 Hemi in the hangar somewhere... wanna try that out! lol  ... looks like 521 and 467 liquid cools from others for sale.
I have the perfect reply to that. Just let me dig up a link.
Here it is Wayne. Just an audio clip.
That was priceless Curt lol  A Yammie ski-do with a yammie sticker hahahaha
Here's the story in order. 1. 2. 3. 4. Da mower is not on youtube. Yo'll have to download it to see how the 454 finally rests.
On another note...anyone have any idea on what motor I can use?
521 was in it but 440-470-500-582-583-670 all them twin cyl  motors drop in with your orig mounts without much fuss
no problem your gonna have a hard time moving that tank with a fan cooler ,you can put a FC in there ,try and find a 521 there snotty lil engines
Been lookin around on dootalk.com and it looks like it would be way easier to go liquid cooled.
